moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 d5: This is Elephant's gambit. As we read in Wikipedia this opening is considered to be better for White.
moves.4. dxc6 Nxc6: Sacrifice accepted, letting me develop my knight.
moves.5. h3 a6 6. Bc4 Be6 7. Bxe6 fxe6 8. Nxe5: I was afraid , that after  8. ... Nxe5  might follow 9. Qh5+.
moves.21. Rfe1 Bc5 22. Re6 Bxd4 23. Rxf6 Bxf6: Now Black's Rook is in White's weakest sqare.
moves.26. Rb1 Kg6 27. f3 Kg5 28. g3 c5 29. a3: Now black has to play carefully, without wasting a move.
